identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Control Room' aesthetic that feels like a military-grade cyber defense system, not a generic SaaS dashboard.
principles: Content: Data is the art. Dense, correlated, live.
Negative Space: Use it to group functional zones, not just for air.
Contrast: High-contrast neon against void black.

card.style: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-border/50 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

button.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm
button.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm
button.outline: border border-primary/50 text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm

badge.style: font-mono uppercase tracking-widest text-[10px] px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full border

media.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'SquareActivity', 'ShieldAlert', 'Network', 'Cpu', 'Radio' for navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: Run 'npm install recharts react-force-graph-2d framer-motion' immediately.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the new colors and fonts defined in this JSON.
3. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'DashboardLayout' component that uses a fixed sidebar and a top bar with glassmorphism.
4. BUILD TOPOLOGY: Create a 'NetworkGraph' component using 'react-force-graph-2d'. It should be interactive (zoom/pan).
5. IMPLEMENT THEME: Enforce dark mode by default. Add the 'dark' class to the html or body tag.
6. USE SHADCN: Use the existing Shadcn components but override their styles using the 'components' rules above (e.g., remove rounded corners, add borders).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Avoid centered layouts for dashboard content.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
